testcase.name: should initialize with correct default values
should convert note names to MIDI note numbers
should throw error for invalid note names
should convert MIDI note numbers to note names
should be able to convert back and forth
should throw error for unknown scale type
should generate diminished and augmented chords correctly
should throw error for unknown chord type
should return correct key signature for major keys
should return correct key signature for minor keys
should throw error for invalid mode
should generate a I-IV-V-I progression in C major
should generate a i-iv-v-i progression in A minor
